            • @groovy.transform.CompileDynamic @TaskAction void exec()

            • @Input @SkipWhenEmpty VfsURICollection getDirectories()

              Stages all URIs and return a collection of directories to be created.

              Returns:
              Collection of resolved URIs

            • @java.lang.Override boolean isUpToDate()

              Check whether this task should be considered up to date. As this means checking on remote servers for existance of directories, it will requires all directory URIs to be resolved and as such also some potential network traffic.

              Returns:
              True if up to date.

            • void setDirectories(java.lang.Object... dirs)
